description: Details required for Conditions 4 (Secure Cycle Parking Facilities) andL (Erection of two storey side/rear extension and alterations to existing dwelling to create total of 3no. self-contained flats with balconies at first and second floor levels with associated parking facilities, refuse/recycling facilities and cycle parking and associated works including bin and cycle storage)

decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted for Conditions  5 (Waste and Recycling Facilities) of planning permission 21/03165/FUL. The applicant has not demonstrated that the development would achieve a satisfactory appearance on completion.
